table.caption: Table 278 – Entries in a media clip section MH/BE dictionary
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Optional) A media offset dictionary (see 13.2.6.2, “Media Offset Dictionary”) that specifies the offset into the next-level media object at which the media clip section begins. Default: the start of the next-level media object.

(Optional) A media offset dictionary (see 13.2.6.2, “Media Offset Dictionary”) that specifies the offset into the next-level media object at which the media clip section ends. Default: the end of the next-level media object.
